channel.title: Set up for advertising?
channel.description: Alright I got my source all edited and fun :D And i got Moparscape Client that ive been using to log in, now what do i do to advertise it? Like doi make another folder called " < servername >" and move all the files except the control ones from the source into it? AND I include the run on moparscape client into it as well? Or what?
